scripts.deploy:cli: rm -rf packages/cli/dist && tsc --build --force && cp README.md packages/cli/. && yarn workspace @aduh95/caritat-cli npm publish --access public
scripts.deploy:core: rm -rf packages/core/dist && tsc --build --force && cp README.md packages/core/. && yarn workspace @aduh95/caritat npm publish --access public
scripts.deploy:crypto: rm -rf packages/crypto/dist && tsc --build --force && yarn workspace @aduh95/caritat-crypto npm publish --access public
